doc.title: Beancurd City: The Family Saga continues
doc.text: This/DT is/VBZ part/NN 3/CD of/IN the/DT Rochor/JJ Bean/NN Curd/NN saga/NN ./. In/IN our/PRP$ previous/JJ episode/NN ,/, we/PRP found/VBD out/IN that/WDT David/NN ,/, the/DT youngest/NN of/IN the/DT four/NN brothers/NN decided/VBD to/TO branch/NN out/IN on/IN his/PRP$ own/JJ and/CC subsequently/RB opened/VBD a/DT branch/NN right/NN next/JJ to/TO the/DT original/JJ Rochor/NN Bean/NN Curd/NN stall/NN in/IN Short/NNP Street/NNP ./. After/JJ being/NN there/RB for/IN a/DT few/JJ months/NNS ,/, he/PRP shifted/VBD out/IN of/IN the/DT stall/NN which/WDT was/VBD subsequently/RB taken/VBN over/IN by/IN the/DT sister/NN ./. So/RB what/WP happened/VBD ?/. What/WP are/VBP the/DT juicy/NN details/NNS of/IN this/DT family/NN feud/NN ?/. Well/RB ,/, my/PRP$ way/NN of/IN cutting/VBG a/DT long/JJ story/NN short/NN is/VBZ to/TO paste/NN a/DT link/NN to/TO this/DT story/NN by/IN Teo/NNP Pau/NNP Lin/NN who/WP has/VBZ already/RB penned/VBG it/PRP all/DT down/NN ./. Anyway/RB ,/, its/PRP$ not/RB about/IN the/DT feud/NN but/CC the/DT food/NN ./. And/CC I/PRP was/VBD pleasantly/RB surprised/VBN with/IN the/DT bean/NN curd/NN here/RB ./. It/PRP was/VBD excellent/JJ ./. The/DT texture/NN was/VBD soft/JJ and/CC silky/JJ but/CC I/PRP felt/VBD that/IN it/PRP still/RB manages/VBD to/TO retain/VB the/DT taste/NN of/IN the/DT beans/NNS rather/RB then/RB tasting/VBG as/IN if/IN it/PRP was/VBD too/RB watered/VBN down/NN ./. It/PRP was/VBD a/DT very/RB enjoyable/JJ bowl/NN of/IN bean/NN curd/NN ./. Probably/JJ as/IN good/JJ as/IN bean/NN curd/NN gets/VBZ in/IN Singapore/NNP ./.
